statements: UPDATE preprocessing_data SET preprocessing_function = 'standardize', preprocessing_script = 'Script A' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE preprocessing_data SET dataset_name = 'Dataset X', preprocessing_script = 'Script B' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE preprocessing_data SET preprocessing_function='remove_stopwords' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE preprocessing_data SET preprocessing_script='import nltk
from nltk.corpus import stopwords
nltk.download("stopwords")
stop_words = set(stopwords.words("english"))

def remove_stopwords(text):
    tokens = text.split()
    tokens = [word for word in tokens if word.lower() not in stop_words]
    return ' '.join(tokens)' WHERE dataset_name='news_data';
